ayas.arabic: حمٓ
ayas.translation: Ha. Mim.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayas.translation: By the Scripture that maketh plain

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
ayas.translation: Lo! We revealed it on a blessed night - Lo! We are ever warning -
ayas.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatim mubārakah ۚ innā kunnā mundhirīn

ayas.arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Whereon every wise command is made clear

ayas.arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
ayas.translation: As a command from Our presence - Lo! We are ever sending -

ayas.arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: A mercy from thy Lord. Lo! He, even He is the Hearer, the Knower,
ayas.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbik ۚ innahu huwas samī`ul `alīm

ayas.arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayas.translation: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, if ye would be sure.
ayas.transliteration: rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā ۖ in kuntum mūqinīn

ayas.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: There is no Allah save Him. He quickeneth and giveth death; your Lord and Lord of your forefathers.
ayas.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥyī wayumīt ۖ rabbukum warabbu ābā-ikumul-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay, but they play in doubt.

ayas.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: But watch thou (O Muhammad) for the day when the sky will produce visible smoke
ayas.transliteration: fartaqib yawma ta-tis samā-u bidukhānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: That will envelop the people. This will be a painful torment.

ayas.arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: (Then they will say): Our Lord relieve us of the torment. Lo! we are believers.

ayas.arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: How can there be remembrance for them, when a messenger making plain (the Truth) had already come unto them,
ayas.transliteration: annā lahumudh dhikrā waqad jā-ahum rasūlun mubīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
ayas.translation: And they had turned away from him and said: One taught (by others), a madman?

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! We withdraw the torment a little. Lo! ye return (to disbelief).

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
ayas.translation: On the day when We shall seize them with the greater seizure, (then) in truth We shall punish.
ayas.transliteration: yawma nabṭishul baṭshatal kubrā innā muntaqimūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And verily We tried before them Pharaoh's folk, when there came unto them a noble messenger,
ayas.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir`awna wajā-ahum rasūlun karīm

ayas.arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
ayas.translation: Saying: Give up to me the slaves of Allah. Lo! I am a faithful messenger unto you.
ayas.transliteration: an addū ilayya `ibādallāh ۖ innī lakum rasūlun amīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: And saying: Be not proud against Allah. Lo! I bring you a clear warrant.
ayas.transliteration: wa-an lā ta`lū `alallāh ۖ innī ātīkum bisulṭānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
ayas.translation: And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death.
ayas.transliteration: wa innī `udhtu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūn

ayas.arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
ayas.translation: And if ye put no faith in me, then let me go.
ayas.transliteration: wa in lam tu-minū lī fa`tazilūn

ayas.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
ayas.translation: And he cried unto his Lord, (saying): These are guilty folk.
ayas.transliteration: fada`ā rabbahu anna hā-ulā-i qawmun mujrimūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Then (his Lord commanded): Take away My slaves by night. Lo! ye will be followed,

ayas.arabic: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
ayas.translation: And leave the sea behind at rest, for lo! they are a drowned host.
ayas.transliteration: wātrukil baḥra rahwā ۖ innahum jundun mughraqūn

ayas.arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
ayas.translation: How many were the gardens and the watersprings that they left behind,

ayas.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And the cornlands and the goodly sites

ayas.arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
ayas.translation: And pleasant things wherein they took delight!

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayas.translation: Even so (it was), and We made it an inheritance for other folk;

ayas.arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
ayas.translation: And the heaven and the earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.
ayas.transliteration: famā bakat `alayhimus samā-u wal-arḍu wa mā kānū munẓarīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
ayas.translation: And We delivered the Children of Israel from the shameful doom;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī isrā-iyla minal `adhābil muhīn

ayas.arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayas.translation: (We delivered them) from Pharaoh. Lo! he was a tyrant of the wanton ones.
ayas.transliteration: min fir`awn ۚ innahu kāna `āliyan minal musrifīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: And We chose them, purposely, above (all) creatures.

ayas.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: And We gave them portents wherein was a clear trial.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ātaynāhum minal-āyāti mā fīhi balā-un mubīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! these, forsooth, are saying:

ayas.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
ayas.translation: There is naught but our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
ayas.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimunsharīn

ayas.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Bring back our fathers, if ye speak the truth!

ayas.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Are they better, or the folk of Tubb'a and those before them? We destroyed them, for surely they were guilty.
ayas.transliteration: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubba`in wal ladhīna min qablihim ۚ ahlaknāhum ۖ innahum kānū mujrimīn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
ayas.translation: And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in play.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā khalaqnas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā lā`ibīn

ayas.arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: We created them not save with truth; but most of them know not.
ayas.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil ḥaqqi walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayas.translation: Assuredly the Day of Decision is the term for all of them,

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: A day when friend can in naught avail friend, nor can they be helped,
ayas.transliteration: yawma lā yughnī mawlan `an mawlan shay-an walā hum yunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Save him on whom Allah hath mercy. Lo! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: illā man raḥimallāh ۚ innahu huwal `azīzur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
ayas.translation: Lo! the tree of Zaqqum,

ayas.arabic: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
ayas.translation: The food of the sinner!

ayas.arabic: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
ayas.translation: Like molten brass, it seetheth in their bellies

ayas.arabic: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
ayas.translation: As the seething of boiling water.

ayas.arabic: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: (And it will be said): Take him and drag him to the midst of hell,

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
ayas.translation: Then pour upon his head the torment of boiling water.
ayas.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa ra-sihi min `adhābil ḥamīm

ayas.arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
ayas.translation: (Saying): Taste! Lo! thou wast forsooth the mighty, the noble!

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! this is that whereof ye used to doubt.
ayas.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
ayas.translation: Lo! those who kept their duty will be in a place secured.

ayas.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
ayas.translation: Amid gardens and watersprings,

ayas.arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
ayas.translation: Attired in silk and silk embroidery, facing one another.
ayas.transliteration: yalbasūna min sundusin wa istabraqin mutaqābilīn

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
ayas.translation: Even so (it will be). And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes.

ayas.arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayas.translation: They call therein for every fruit in safety.

ayas.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayas.translation: They taste not death therein, save the first death. And He hath saved them from the doom of hell,
ayas.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhal mawta illal-mawtatal-ūlā ۖ wawaqāhum `adhābal jaḥīm

ayas.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: A bounty from thy Lord. That is the supreme triumph.
ayas.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbik ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: And We have made (this Scripture) easy in thy language only that they may heed.

ayas.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Wait then (O Muhammad). Lo! they (too) are waiting.
